overview: Danny Jones was a racing driver, the fastest of the Jones Boys. After taking the fall for a heist gone wrong we find him fresh out of prison.Danny returns home to find his father dead, his mother ill and his brother Séan missing. When he learns that Séan lost the family garage gambling and has landed himself in deep trouble with a local gangster over unpaid debts, Danny is thrust back into the world of British motor racing in a desperate attempt to clear the family name and win it all back. With their lives on the line, and an angry gangster on their tail, the only way out is past the chequered flag.
title: All Crazy Random
